title: Gorgeous Private 4 Bedroom House!!!
posting_body: OFFICIAL LINK:  <URL>
🤓PLEASE COPY AND PASTE LINK TO APPLY🤓
What if you could achieve your goals?
This beautiful four-bedroom property is completely renovated you will be the absolute FIRST TO ENJOY IT!!!
All new mechanics and windows so no issues to worry about.
It welcomes you with a nice kitchen, laminate flooring new cabinetry and lighting.
There is a big living room and dining room combo, great lightning all-throughout making this very welcoming to friends and family.
There are two bathrooms, both fully renovated all new fixtures.
Three nice sized bedrooms two with closets, along with a massive master bedroom that has two closets and even SECOND FLOOR LAUNDRY ACCESS!!!
Are we missing anything???
Lock in your application TODAY, THIS OPPORTUNITY WILL GO FAST!!!
Pets: This home is pet friendly.
Cost of pet is $40 per animal per month.
Along with $150 Non-refundable deposit.
If you have a pet without pre-approval from owner your residency can and will be discontinued.
Utilities: Tenant pays water, sewer, trash, gas, electric, internet and phone.
Appliances: tenants will supply appliances.
(Possibly negotiable)
Parking: Parking available in driveway, on street.
Section 8 and EDEN are not accepted.
All adults must be on the lease and pass background/credit checks on their own.
Incomes can be combined to meet minimum.
Tenant insurance: Homeowners insurance never covers tenant property you are welcome to get coverage however it is not required.
We have found it very much appreciated by tenants and it gives peace of mind but it’s completely up to your discretion.
Application and screening: All applicants 18 and older must fill out an application.
This property will continue to be offered until we are in possession of certified funds to the hold property from being rented to an APPROVED applicant.
We screen on multiple dimensions with an eye on seeing how applicants could in fact be great tenants.
If you want this home please apply.
Owner may make screening exceptions in exchange for alternative terms.
